reviews.review_msg: (FANX99, not EDUC211) Sheena was great! I initially didn't think I could pass the class at all because I'm that bad at math. But she is very caring, and genuinely wants you to do well. Don't be afraid to ask questions or for clarification, she won't get mad or impatient - she'll keep explaining until you understand. I'd recommend her 100%!!

I had her as my Fanx99 prof and she was really nice, and went out of her way to help and make her self accessible. You can tell she really cares about her students. I would take fanx99 with her if you can.

Sheena is one of the only profs at SFU in my experience that cared how you did in the class. If you show up, try, and reach out if things are uncertain then there is no reason for you to not succeed in the class. Would recommend for anyone, even someone who is not going into education.

Sheena was great and I really enjoyed this class. Many had the impression of it being a GPA booster and were disappointed. If you put in the effort to understand and do the work, you will do well because you earned it, not simply because it is an education class. Sheena cares about students and is absolutely fair.
